meanings.sent1: I found a pruta on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She saved every pruta she earned.
meanings.sent3: The pruta rolled away like a tiny wheel.
meanings.sent4: His words were as insignificant as a pruta in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent5: The pruta gleamed in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.sent1: He only had a pruta of patience left.
meanings.sent2: She offered a pruta of advice to her friend.
meanings.sent3: The pruta of sugar made the coffee too sweet.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a pruta in the sea of indifference.
meanings.sent5: The pruta of time they spent together was precious.
